title: Council Decision of 18 September 2006 appointing a member of the Advisory Committee of the Euratom Supply Agency
header:
6.10.2006 EN Official Journal of the European Union C 241/1
COUNCIL DECISION
of 18 September 2006
appointing a member of the Advisory Committee of the Euratom Supply Agency
(2006/C 241/01)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to the Treaty establishing the European Atomic Energy Community, and in particular the second and third paragraphs of Article 54 thereof,
Having regard to Article X of the Statutes of the Euratom Supply Agency (1),
Having regard to the Council Decision of 12 July 2005 appointing the members of the Advisory Committee of the Euratom Supply Agency (2),
Having regard to the opinion of the Commission,
Whereas:
(1) A member's seat on the above Committee has fallen vacant for Austria.
(2) That vacancy should therefore be filled.
(3) The Austrian Government submitted a nomination on 1 December 2005,
main_body: Ms Christine GÖSTL is hereby appointed a member of the Advisory Committee of the Euratom Supply Agency for the remainder of the Committee's term of office, which ends on 28 March 2007.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 18 September 2006
For the Council
The President
J. KORKEAOJA
(1)  OJ 27, 6.12.1958, p. 534/58. Statutes last amended by Decision 95/1/EC, Euratom, ECSC of 1 January 1995 (OJ L 1, 1.1.1995, p. 1)
(2)  OJ C 178, 20.7.2005, p. 1.
